page.title: 11SUNDAY SCHOOL IN WILDEN.
page.content: I like Sunday School. It tells you about God and Jesus. He is my friend.About 15 of us go. My best friend is only three she goes.So does Susan she's eleven. We go once a month, and practice hims with Chrissie up her house on Thursdays too. The morning starts with the rector talking to us then Chrissie plays a him. She's blind. Then we split up into groups. The little ones go with Rachel to colour and draw. My group has talks, and writing sometimes drawing. We're doing a project wich will be ready at Xmas. Then we all come together for joint prayers at the end then we go home and have dinner. When I'm old like Rachel she's 12, I shall ask recter if I can help. I shall ask God to help me too.Amen.
